Load essential libraries for relative pathing and yaml parsing.
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(yaml)
```


Load the config file with data paths.
```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
config <- yaml.load_file("config.yml")
print(config$RNAseq_DEGs)
```
